Name: Brandy Club Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Lustau Oloroso Don Nuño Sherry
15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange & lemon grated zest mixed with caster sugar rim.
Review: Cognac and zesty orange curacao with sherry. The sugary rim is essential to the balance of this drink.
History: Adapted from a 2015 recipe by Ryu Okada at Kampai Cocktails (a mobile cocktail bar company based in Sussex, England.)
Nutrition: One serving of Brandy Club Cocktail contains 183 calories
